input.sentences: we went to visit the old part of the city .
[male] wanted a picture of the cross .
i preferred the architecture of the old cathedrals .
the steeple in this one cathedral had charms hanging from the ceiling .
outside | a police gate separated the lines of tourists from the cathedral .
output.sentences: The guy took a picture of the cross.
The cathedrals architecture is preferred over all.
The hanging charms in the steeple give it a unique look.
The police have separated the tourist with metal gates.
